legal_basis: Section 15 of the Canadian Charter of Rights and Freedoms
cause_of_action: denied membership in the Squamish Nation due to being adopted
procedure_followed: Judicial review of Squamish Nation Membership Appeals Committee decisions
decision_reasoning: discriminates against adopted children but is justified under section 1 of the Charter as it preserves Squamish culture and identity
result_of_case: Application dismissed; Membership Code upheld as discriminatory but justified
charter_rights: equality rights under section 15 of the Charter
